name: geobork
description: Geo Borker (Broker) is a server for storing locations through a REST API.
author: Christopher Fred√©n <christopher.freden@kartena.se>

scripts.install: node node_modules/coffee-script/bin/coffee -c -o js lib && node node_modules/coffee-script/bin/coffee -c client
scripts.watch: node node_modules/coffee-script/bin/coffee -cw -o js lib & node node_modules/coffee-script/bin/coffee -cw client
